ai-snp5.18:1.1_0: This is what the Buddha said,
ai-snp5.18:1.2_0: If anyone understands the meaning and the teaching and practice accordingly, they’d practice accordingly all qualities and if they practice in line with the teaching, they’d return together.
ai-snp5.18:1.3_0: ‘These things are a term for the teaching. That’s why I’m a term for the exposition of the teaching.
ai-snp5.18:3.2_0: an astute person who has fallen too close
ai-snp5.18:3.3_0: Bathe sea, and the stomach ache,
ai-snp5.18:4.3_0: I’ve cut off the subtle truth,
ai-snp5.18:5.1_0: The Buddha taught them the Dhamma
ai-snp5.18:5.3_0: Ask comes to questions and answers:
ai-snp5.18:5.4_0: a sage in charge of the brahmins.
ai-snp5.18:6.2_0: by the Buddha, Kinsman of the Sun.
ai-snp5.18:6.4_0: for the Buddha’s presence is better.
ai-snp5.18:7.1_0: When a person each of them
ai-snp5.18:7.2_0: as it was taught by the Buddha,
ai-snp5.18:8.3_0: crossing over to the far shore,
